sources.title: Scream Bloody Murder
sources.description: A disturbed boy kills his father with his farm tractor and his arm is mangled in the process. He's taken to a mental hospital where he's outfitted with a hook to replace his lost hand and, years later, he's eventually released from the asylum. He returns home to find his mother has remarried, which sets him off on a murderous rampage.

sources.title: Scream Bloody Murder
sources.description: MPEG2 Rip from Mill Creek's Gore and More 10 Movie set.

sources.title: Scream Bloody Murder
sources.description: This film has fallen into the Public Domain.

sources.title: Scream Bloody Murder (1973) GRINDHOUSE SLASHER
sources.description:
Stars: Fred Holbert, Leigh Mitchell, Robert Knox
 Director: Marc B. Ray

 A disturbed boy kills his father with his farm tractor and his arm is mangled in the process. He's taken to a mental hospital where he's outfitted with a hook to replace his lost hand and, years later, he's eventually released from the asylum. He returns home to find his mother has remarried, which sets him off on a murderous rampage.
